sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>For zboot only, set the default value of the "Flow" field on the SLA Definition ["contract_sla"] table to "Default SLA Flow"</description>
        <name>Set default Flow value on SLA Definition</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[(function() {
	if (pm.isZboot()) {
		var defaultSLAFlow = "Default SLA Flow";

		var sysDictionaryGr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
		sysDictionaryGr.addQuery('name', 'contract_sla');
		sysDictionaryGr.addQuery('element', 'flow');
		sysDictionaryGr.query();

		if (!sysDictionaryGr.next())
			return;

		var sysHubFlowGr = new GlideRecord("sys_hub_flow");
		sysHubFlowGr.addQuery("name", defaultSLAFlow);
		sysHubFlowGr.query();
		
		if (!sysHubFlowGr.next())
			return;
		
		sysDictionaryGr.setValue("default_value", defaultSLAFlow);
		sysDictionaryGr.update();
	}
})();]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2019-09-15 23:37:17</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>63579c2773333300e289235f04f6a775</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Set default Flow value on SLA Definition</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="SLA Flows" source="com.snc.sla.flows">6b1abca83cf1311068bcf327dfe37fe1</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_63579c2773333300e289235f04f6a775</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2019-09-15 23:38:48</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Set default Flow value on SLA Definition
